item.title: Wing Leading Edge Overheat Detection System – Dual Loop System – One Loop Per Wing Inoperative

remarks.para: One loop in each wing may be inoperative provided the remaining loop(s) is operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard adjacent to FIRE/OVHT Test Switch: "WING L/E FIRE DET LOOP A (or B) INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
